def_cn: （艺人等的）试镜，试演，试唱，试奏
def_en: An audition is a short performance given by an actor, dancer, or musician so that a director or conductor can decide if they are good enough to be in a play, film, or orchestra.

def_cn: 试镜;让…试演（或试唱、试音）
def_en: If you audition or if someone auditions you, you do an audition.
